doc.title: Hate
doc.plot: A real-life look at how hate crimes impact our community. Several hate crimes are profiled and 2 are reenacted. We interview the victims & their families. By interviewing the families of the victims, people will see firsthand that the victim is not the only person affected by these horrible crimes. Our goal is to give youth and adults a firsthand look into the negative impact of racism and promote unity and justice around the world.
